document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bc7488">Declaiming </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffd04c">Waters </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">none </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff769c">dread, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffd04c">Waters </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">most </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffd04c">mighty </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">cause </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bc7488">Nature </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffd04c">full </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
